Entity Information

  • Class Name: PotionOfHealing.java
  • Entity Kind: PotionOfHealing
  • Type: Item
  • Category: Potion

Statistics

  • Default Price: 30 gold when identified
  • Default Known: false (becomes known when consumed, shattered, or seen after being identified)

Special Abilities

  • Full Healing: Restores all HP to maximum (heals 100% of max HP) when consumed
  • Status Curing: Removes Poison, Cripple, Weakness, and Bleeding status effects
  • Shattering: When shattered on the ground, heals 50% of max HP to any character on that tile
  • Arrow Moistening: Can be used to moisten arrows to create Health Arrows
  • Targeted Healing: Can be thrown at allies to heal them
